main_lane_signal.title: Main Lane Signal
main_lane_signal.description: When enabled, this signal will be used to half-press camera shutter release to reduce lag. Set to 0 to disable this function

violation_window_in_16th_sec.title: Violation Window
violation_window_in_16th_sec.description: Violation window in measured by 1/16th of a second.

violation_per_phase.title: Violation Per Phase
violation_per_phase.description: Advanced user setting for testing (the  number of violation that can occur per lane per light phase before enforcement is suspended). Set to 0 to disable this function

flash1_binary.title: Flash1 Binary
flash1_binary.description: for example: value of 55 is ASCII character '7', this is what's send to flash control unit

flash2_binary.title: Flash2 Binary
flash2_binary.description: for example: value of 55 is ASCII character '7', this is what's send to flash control unit

flash3_binary.title: Flash3 Binary
flash3_binary.description: for example: value of 55 is ASCII character '7', this is what's send to flash control unit

car_speed_threshold.title: Car Speed Threshold
car_speed_threshold.description: Minimum Speed Threshold once set must be met or exceeded for a Car Speed violation to be captured

truck_speed_threshold.title: Truck Speed Threshold
truck_speed_threshold.description: Minimum Speed Threshold once set must be met or exceeded for a Truck Speed violation to be captured (Vehicle length setting must be configured to set the truck length)

oneOf.title: Don't Fire
oneOf.description: Secondary flash will not fire

oneOf.title: Fire
oneOf.description: Secondary flash will fire

site_max_plausible_speed.title: Implausible Speed
site_max_plausible_speed.description: Advanced user setting for testing ( the speed put into this field will deactivate enforcement if it is exceeded by a reported vehicle speed).

oneOf.title: Overwrite
oneOf.description: Overwrite measured speed with the StopSpeed value, no change to speed quality.

oneOf.title: Normal
oneOf.description: Report speed as is, and report [0xF1] speed quality

oneOf.title: Suppress
oneOf.description: Suppress the speed to zero, and report [0xF2] speed quality.

oneOf.title: Divide
oneOf.description: Divide the speed by two, and report [0xF3] speed quality.

oneOf.title: Ignore
oneOf.description: Completely ignore the datapoint.

speed_time_2nd_shot.title: Speed Time Delay
speed_time_2nd_shot.description: Time after first photo is triggered before the second photo is triggered.If both the time and distance to second photo are set to 0, no second photo will be captured.

speed_dist_2nd_shot.title: Speed Distance Delay
speed_dist_2nd_shot.description: Distance vehicle must travel before second photo is triggered.If used in conjunction with the time to 2nd photo, the time interval must be met before the distance setting will trigger.

oneOf.title: Don't Fire
oneOf.description: Secondary flash will not fire

oneOf.title: Fire
oneOf.description: Secondary flash will fire

vehicle_length.title: Vehicle Length
vehicle_length.description: Set the length that a vehicle would be classified as a truck. All vehicles under this length will register as a car

oneOf.title: None
oneOf.description: No wired light phase are connected, all 4 channels are VLPD.

oneOf.title: Wired channel 1
oneOf.description: A single standard 3 bulb light stack is connected to channel 1, all other channels are VLPD.

oneOf.title: Wired channel 1 & 2
oneOf.description: Two standard 3 bulb stacks are connected to channels 1 and 2, channels 3 and 4 are VLPD.

oneOf.title: Wired channel 1, 2 & 3
oneOf.description: Three two bulb (R and Y wired, G assumed) are connected to channels 1,2, and 3, channel 4 is VLPD.

oneOf.title: 5 head stack
oneOf.description: A single 5 head stack is connected to channels 1 and 2, channels 3 and 4 are VLPD.

oneOf.title: 7 head stack
oneOf.description: A single 7 head stack is connected to channels 1,2 and 3, channel 4 is VLPD.

oneOf.title: Light
oneOf.description: Light noise and glitch filtering active.

oneOf.title: Medium
oneOf.description: Medium noise and glitch filtering is active.

oneOf.title: Heavy
oneOf.description: Heavy noise and glitch filtering is active.

oneOf.title: Short
oneOf.description: Short last non-dark phase hold time on transition to Dark.

oneOf.title: Medium
oneOf.description: Medium transition to Dark hold time.

oneOf.title: Long
oneOf.description: Long transition to Dark hold time.

roadway_heading_tolerance.title: Roadway Heading Tolerance
roadway_heading_tolerance.description: For SMR Type-48 roadway heading tolerance, typically 10 or less

system_latency_compensation.title: System Latency Compensation
system_latency_compensation.description: For SMR type 42 or type 48, 0-7 system latency compensation

max_ashot_speed.title: Max A-Shot Speed
max_ashot_speed.description: Maximum A speed at which spare20 logic is active

bshot_speed_modifier.title: B-Shot Speed Modifier
bshot_speed_modifier.description: B-speed decrease from A-speed parameter above which kills the B-shot

max_num_violations_per_phase.title: Max Violations Per Red Phase
max_num_violations_per_phase.description: Maximum number of violations (all lanes) per RED phase

suspend_red_phase.title: Suspend Red Phase
suspend_red_phase.description: Number of RED phases to suspend processing if MFMspare21 rule is violated

rl_high_speed_threshold.title: RL High Speed Threshold
rl_high_speed_threshold.description: For use with 3P Sensys in US Based Version. If a vehicle speed when measured between the 1st and 2nd pod is above this threshold the violation will trigger immediately. If the measured speed is below this threshold, the system will wait for a speed measurement between the 2nd and 3rd pod and as long as this exceeds the min speed threshold, the violation trigger sequence will start.

agile_radar_type.title: Agile Radar Type
agile_radar_type.description: Assigns the radar type in use.

bshot_holdoff.title: B-Shot Holdoff
bshot_holdoff.description: holdoff B-shot on receding vehicle if non-zero.

transverse_velocity.title: Transverse Velocity
transverse_velocity.description: SMR unsigned transverse velocity limit in 0.1 Meters per second units

rail_cross_grace_time.title: Rail Cross Grace
rail_cross_grace_time.description: Global Rail Cross Grace time in 1/10 second units

yellow_phase_calibration.title: Yellow Phase Calibration
yellow_phase_calibration.description: Signed (-128 to +127) yellow duration calibration, in units of 0.000976526 ms seconds

speedboard.title: Speedboard
speedboard.description: The type of speedboard that is attached.

oneOf.title: None
oneOf.description: No speed board attached.

oneOf.title: Three Digits
oneOf.description: Three digit speed board attached.

oneOf.title: Two Digits
oneOf.description: Two digit speed board attached.

speedboard_baud.title: Speedboard Baud
speedboard_baud.description: Baud rate of attached speed board

speedboard_display.title: Speedboard Display
speedboard_display.description: Determines which vehicle speeds to display

speedboard_lane.title: Speedboard Lane
speedboard_lane.description: Bit encoded lanes that use speed board. Ex. 15 translates to 0x0F, which enables the speed board for lanes 0-3.

split_car_filter.title: Split Car Filter
split_car_filter.description: Any non-zero value will tell the MFM to filter out duplicated objects from the Smartmicro radar.

logical_lane_name.title: Logical Lane Name
logical_lane_name.description: Number assigned to this lane to appear on the databar.

special_monitoring_options.title: Special Monitoring Options
special_monitoring_options.description:
1:Log only
2:Lane closed to traffic
4:No crosswalk incursion permitted
8:All traffic monitoring disabled
16:Reserved
32:Reserved
64:No turn any time
128:No turn on red

oneOf.title: Log
oneOf.description: Log only.

oneOf.title: Closed
oneOf.description: Lane closed to traffic.

oneOf.title: No Crosswalk
oneOf.description: No crosswalk incursion permitted.

oneOf.title: Disable
oneOf.description: All traffic monitoring disabled.

oneOf.title: Reserved
oneOf.description: Reserved.

oneOf.title: Reserved
oneOf.description: Reserved.

oneOf.title: No Turns
oneOf.description: No turn at any time.

oneOf.title: NTOR
oneOf.description: No right turn on red.

lane_signal_channel.title: Lane Signal Channel
lane_signal_channel.description: The traffic light number this lane is assigned to.

oneOf.title: Normal
oneOf.description: Three bulb light.

oneOf.title: No Yellow
oneOf.description: Only green and red are wired. Yellow phase is not used.

signal_fault_monitoring.title: Signal Fault Monitoring
signal_fault_monitoring.description: This setting determines how tolerant the MFM is to invalid light phase transitions.

oneOf.title: None
oneOf.description: No fault monitoring

oneOf.title: Measured
oneOf.description: Require all phases per 6 transitions

oneOf.title: Strick
oneOf.description: Require strick phase sequencing

oneOf.title: Report
oneOf.description: Report fault on long dark

rail_cross_signal.title: Rail Cross Signal
rail_cross_signal.description: Specify a light phase channe 1-4 channel, If a duplicate number is entered in this field and the Lane Signal channel field a fault will occur.  Rail crossing channel assignments, if used, must specifiy a channel not assigned for any other purpose. The chosen channel number is entered on the [rail cross signal] line for each lane controlled by the rail crossing input. Any channel number 1 through 4 may be specified as a rail crossing input.  The same channel number may not also be specified for any lane on the [lane signal channel] line else a light phase configuration error is registered.An Active rail crossing input is recognized when the associated input is RED, or is DARK and had been RED within the previous 2 seconds. Active Green or Yellow inputs on a channel defined for rail crossing use will result in a fault condition.

min_yellow_in_10th_sec.description: Minimum time yellow phase must be measured to go into enforcement.

position_state_table_selector.description: Camera must be set to Intersection Safety and 3P Sensys to use.

oneOf.title: None
oneOf.description: None

oneOf.title: Saudi
oneOf.description: Original Saudi Ver

oneOf.title: Enhanced
oneOf.description: Enhanced Detection to 2 Sensor Trigger

oneOf.title: CrossWalk
oneOf.description: Enhanced CrossWalk Detection Eastern Region Config

oneOf.title: Low
oneOf.description: Low magnetic detection in Center of vehicle enhancement

red_grace_in_100th_sec.title: Red Grace Time
red_grace_in_100th_sec.description: Grace time in 1/100th of a second for red light violations.

speed_adj_factor_in_128th.title: Speed Modifier
speed_adj_factor_in_128th.description: Final speed is calculated by multiplying by this number, then divide by 128. a value of 128 means ratio of 1.0.

speed_handling_modifiers.title: Speed Handling Modifiers
speed_handling_modifiers.description: 3: Repeat entry speed in place of measured exit speed.

oneOf.title: Normal
oneOf.description: Use exit speed as reported.

oneOf.title: Suppress
oneOf.description: Suppress 2nd photo if exit speed not greater than threshold

oneOf.title: Average
oneOf.description: Use average of entry and exit speed as the reported exit speed.

oneOf.title: Repeat
oneOf.description: Repeat entry speed in place of measured exit speed.

red_speed_threshold.title: Red Speed Threshold
red_speed_threshold.description: Minimum speed a vehicle must be traveling to trigger a Red Light violation (Applies to car and truck speeds).

rl_1st_photo_flash_spread.title: RL 1st Flash Spread
rl_1st_photo_flash_spread.description: Determine whether to fire flash on B photos.

oneOf.title: Normal
oneOf.description: Primary direct flash wire triggers on both photos.

oneOf.title: Suppress
oneOf.description: Secondary flash wire trigger fires on B photo only.

rl_time_to_2nd_photo_in_10th_sec.title: RL Time to 2nd Photo
rl_time_to_2nd_photo_in_10th_sec.description: Time in 1/10th of a second after first photo is triggered before the second photo is triggered.

rl_dist_to_2nd_photo.title: RL Distance to 2nd Photo
rl_dist_to_2nd_photo.description: Distance vehicle must travel before second photo is triggered. If used in conjunction with the time to 2nd photo, the time interval must be met before the distance setting will trigger.

rl_2nd_photo_flash_spread.title: RL 2nd Flash Spread
rl_2nd_photo_flash_spread.description: Determine whether to fire flash on B photos.

oneOf.title: Normal
oneOf.description: Primary direct flash wire triggers on both photos.

oneOf.title: Suppress
oneOf.description: Secondary flash wire trigger fires on B photo only.

lane_far_edge_to_datum.title: Lane Distance
lane_far_edge_to_datum.description: Distance measured from the Radar to the far edge of the specified lane.

stopbar_mid_lane_distance.title: Stopbar Distance
stopbar_mid_lane_distance.description: Enter distance from radar to center of stop bar in this specific lane.

capture_mode.title: Capture Mode
capture_mode.description:
0: Both A/B shots
1: A shots only
2: B shot only
3: None

delay_mode.title: Delay Mode
delay_mode.description: The way in which the first will be delayed after the vehicle reaches the stopbar position.

delay_distance.title: Delay Distance
delay_distance.description: The distance the vehicle needs to travel before we take the first shot.

delay_time.title: Delay Time
delay_time.description: The time in milliseconds we delay the first shot.

photos_per_trigger.title: Photos Per Trigger
photos_per_trigger.description: The number of photos we take per MFM trigger.

interval_mode.title: Interval Mode
interval_mode.description: The way in which following photos will be delayed after the first photo.

interval_distance.title: Interval Distance
interval_distance.description: The distance the vehicle needs to travel before we take any additional shots.

interval_time.title: Interval Time
interval_time.description: The time in milliseconds we delay the additional shots.

capture_mode.title: Capture Mode
capture_mode.description:
0: Both A/B shots
1: A shots only
2: B shot only
3: None

delay_mode.title: Delay Mode
delay_mode.description: The way in which the first will be delayed after the vehicle reaches the stopbar position.

delay_distance.title: Delay Distance
delay_distance.description: The distance the vehicle needs to travel before we take the first shot.

delay_time.title: Delay Time
delay_time.description: The time in milliseconds we delay the first shot.

photos_per_trigger.title: Photos Per Trigger
photos_per_trigger.description: The number of photos we take per MFM trigger.

interval_mode.title: Interval Mode
interval_mode.description: The way in which following photos will be delayed after the first photo.

interval_distance.title: Interval Distance
interval_distance.description: The distance the vehicle needs to travel before we take any additional shots.

interval_time.title: Interval Time
interval_time.description: The time in milliseconds we delay the additional shots.

cam.title: Camera
cam.description: When this camera is used to take a photo, these settings will determine the flash that is fired.

channel.title: Flash Channel
channel.description: The hardware flash channel this camera and type will be tied to.

violation.title: Flash Type
violation.description: True if this flash is for violation, false if otherwise.

clip_seconds_pre_event.title: Clip Pre-event
clip_seconds_pre_event.description: The time in seconds to clip video prior to event.

clip_seconds_post_event.title: Clip Post-event
clip_seconds_post_event.description: The time in seconds to clip video after event.

event_type.title: Event Type
event_type.description: This databar will only apply to event type listed here

show_time_lapse.title: Show Time Lapse
show_time_lapse.description: Show the difference in time on the databar

show_num_shots.title: Show Num Shots
show_num_shots.description: Show the number of shots on the databar

font_size.title: Font Size
font_size.description: Font size used in the databar

speed_type.title: Speed Type
speed_type.description: Select true if you want to show the exit speed on the databar.

tip_decimal.title: Tip Decimal
tip_decimal.description: Number of decimal places to use when reporting the time into phase

amber_decimal.title: Amber Decimal
amber_decimal.description: Number of decimal places to use when reporting the amber phase

time_decimal.title: Time Decimal
time_decimal.description: Number of decimal places to use when reporting the time of the event

time_stamp.title: Time Stamp
time_stamp.description: Location of the timestamp on the databar

location_description.title: Location Description
location_description.description: Location of the site description on the databar

violation_type.title: Violation Type
violation_type.description: Location of the violation type on the databar

event_number.title: Event Number
event_number.description: Location of the event number on the databar

image_seq.title: Image Seq
image_seq.description: Location of the image sequence number on the databar

lane.title: Lane
lane.description: Location of the lane number on the databar

speed.title: Speed
speed.description: Location of the speed on the databar

time_into_phase.title: Time Into Phase
time_into_phase.description: Location of the time into phase number on the databar

amber_duration.title: Amber Duration
amber_duration.description: Location of the amber time on the databar

officer_id.title: Officer Id
officer_id.description: Location of the officer ID on the databar

posted_speed.title: Posted Speed
posted_speed.description: Location of the posted speed limit on the databar

radar_serial_number.title: Radar Serial Number
radar_serial_number.description: Location of the sensor serial number on the databar

event_type.title: Event Type
event_type.description: This ROI will only apply to event type listed here

lane.title: Lane
lane.description: The lane this ROI is associated with.

cam.title: Cam
cam.description: The camera this ROI is associated with.

remote.title: Remote
remote.description: True if this photo came from a remote camera.

type.title: Photo Type
type.description: This designates if the photo is an A or B shot.

filter_action.title: Filter Action
filter_action.description: The action to take when a event meets the given criteria.

filter_new_class.title: Filter New Class
filter_new_class.description: Reclassify to this event, if the Filter Action is to Reclassify.

filter_notes.title: Filter Notes
filter_notes.description: Will log this event with this note.

camera_id.title: Camera Identifier
camera_id.description: The camera that will be associated with the location alias.

cool_down.title: Cool Down
cool_down.description: The amount of time in seconds that we will pause after receiving a violation.

posted_speed_limit.title: Posted Speed Limit
posted_speed_limit.description: The is the posted speed limit of the site. This is not the speed that is enforced.

quiet_mode.title: Quiet Mode
quiet_mode.description: If in quiet mode, we will not process any violations.

sensor_serial_number.title: Sensor Serial Number
sensor_serial_number.description: Serial number of the sensor. If present, this will be placed in the metadata of each image.

encryption.title: Encryption
encryption.description: When encryption is turned on, event assets will be encrypted.

setup_operator.title: Setup Operator
setup_operator.description: This is the operator's identifier. This can be placed onto the violation databar.

violation_validation.title: Violation Validation

write_to_db.title: Violation Validation Write to Db
write_to_db.description: Enables or disables writing the violation validation request to db

violation_validation.description: Enables additional validation of detected violations

lpr.title: License Plate Reading
lpr.description: Enables license plate reading on vehicle image captures

cw_time_filter.title: Crosswalk Time Filter Enabled
cw_time_filter.description: Enables or disables crosswalk violation based on time

enabled.title: Enable
enabled.description: True if crosswalk rejection feature should be enabled

cam.title: Cam
cam.description: The camera this ROI is associated with.

lane.title: Lane
lane.description: The lane this ROI is associated with.

remote.title: Remote
remote.description: True if this photo came from a remote camera.

roi.title: Roi
roi.description: A region of interest for the crosswalk rejection model.

direction.title: Direction
direction.description: Describe the expected path of the vehile with two points.

enabled.title: Enable
enabled.description: True if Intelligent ROI feature should be enabled

cam.title: Cam
cam.description: The camera this ROI is associated with.

remote.title: Remote
remote.description: True if this photo came from a remote camera.
